Personal Space
                     

A 3rd person empathy game about coping with social anxiety. Navigate social landscapes in this high energy puzzler!

Steam Early Access
                     

A 3rd person empathy game about coping with social anxiety.

Navigate social landscapes in this high energy puzzler!

Steam Early Access

The FIRST empathy game produced by a Capstone team within University of Utah EAE program

        

Get it now on Steam and the Google Play Store!
